Title: Security firm warns of Copeland controller vulnerabilities
Summary: USA: A cyber security company has exposed vulnerabilities in Copeland E2 and E3 controllers that could enable unauthorised persons to remotely manipulate parameters and disable systems.

Title: LG partners with Octopus Energy
Summary: SOUTH KOREA: LG Electronics has signed a partnership with UK energy supplier Octopus Energy to combine LG’s heating and cooling solutions with Octopus’ AI-driven energy software platform, Kraken.

Title: Wiszniewski to head Samsung AC in Poland
Summary: UK: Damian Wiszniewski, Carrier DX Products’ UK sales manager, is moving back to Poland as head of Samsung Electronics’ AC division.
